===Etymology 1===
Short for {{zh-l|*禪那}}, which is a phonetic borrowing from {{bor|zh|sa|ध्यान||[[dhyana]]|notext=1}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{zh-pron
|m=chán
|c=sim4,sin4
|c_note=sim4 - from [[dissimilation]] of initial and coda. Compare {{zh-l|*蟬}}
|mn=siân/siān
|w=3zoe
|mc=1
|oc=n,1
|cat=n,a
}}

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|Buddhism}} [[dhyana]]; [[deep]] [[meditation]]; [[contemplation]]
# [[Buddhist]] [[doctrine]]; Buddhist [[teaching]]s
# relating to [[Buddhism]]; [[Buddhist]]; [[thoughtful]]; [[philosophical]]
